message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you a great deal on this product. I think you'll find it very valuable. I'm asking for $115.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $100 for it. Would you be willing to consider this price?
Hi Bob, I understand your position, but $100 is just too low for me.  Could you meet me halfway at $107.50?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I still feel that $100 would be the fair price for this product. Could we meet somewhere in the middle at $102.50?
